boost/idl/member_from_signature.hpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  *  @file member_from_signature.hpp
00003  *
00004  *  This file provides templates to convert between member function pointers and 
00005  *  as well as creating a member function signature given a type and signature.
00006  *
00007  */
00008 #ifndef BOOST_PP_IS_ITERATING
00009     #ifndef _BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_HPP_
00010     #define _BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_HPP_
00011     #include <boost/typeof/typeof.hpp>
00012     #include <boost/function.hpp>
00013     #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00014     #include <boost/type_traits/function_traits.hpp>
00015     #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition.hpp>
00016     #include <boost/preprocessor/seq/for_each.hpp>
00017     #include <boost/type_traits/remove_pointer.hpp>
00018 
00019     #define PARAM_NAME(z,n,type)    BOOST_PP_CAT(a,n)
00020     #define PARAM_TYPE(z,n,type)    BOOST_PP_CAT(BOOST_PP_CAT(typename traits::arg,BOOST_PP_ADD(n,1)),_type)
00021     #define PARAM_ARG(z,n,type)     PARAM_TYPE(z,n,type) PARAM_NAME(z,n,type)
00022 
00023     namespace boost { namespace idl { namespace detail {
00024 
00025         template<typename Class, typename Signature, bool is_const = false>
00026         struct member_from_signature 
00027         {
00028             typedef Signature Class::*  type;
00029         };
00030         template<typename T>
00031         struct get_member_type { typedef T type; };
00032 
00033         template<typename Class, typename MemberType>
00034         struct get_member_type<MemberType (Class::*)> 
00035         { 
00036             typedef MemberType  type; 
00037             static const int  arity      = 0;
00038             static const bool is_const   = false;
00039         };
00040 
00041 #        ifndef BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_IMPL_SIZE
00042 #           define BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_IMPL_SIZE 8
00043 #        endif
00044 
00045 #       include <boost/preprocessor/iteration/iterate.hpp>
00046 #       define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_LIMITS (0, BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_IMPL_SIZE -1 )
00047 #       define BOOST_PP_FILENAME_1 <boost/idl/member_from_signature.hpp>
00048 #       include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00049 
00050     #undef PARAM_NAME
00051     #undef PARAM_TYPE
00052     #undef PARAM_ARG
00053 
00054     } } } // namespace boost::idl::detail
00055 
00056     #endif // _BOOST_IDL_MEMBER_FROM_SIGNATURE_HPP_
00057 #else // BOOST_PP_IS_ITERATING
00058 
00059 #define n BOOST_PP_ITERATION()
00060 #define PARAM_NAMES     BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_NAME,A) // name_N
00061 #define PARAM_ARGS      BOOST_PP_ENUM(n,PARAM_ARG,A) // TYPE_N name_N
00062 
00063         template<typename C, typename R BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00064         struct member_from_signature<C, R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A)), false> 
00065         { 
00066             typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::type type; 
00067             static const int  arity    = n;
00068             static const bool is_const = false;
00069         };
00070         template<typename C, typename R BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00071         struct member_from_signature<C, R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A)), true> 
00072         { 
00073             typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const>::type type; 
00074             static const int  arity    = n;
00075             static const bool is_const = true;
00076         };
00077 
00078         template<typename R, typename C BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00079         struct get_member_type<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))> 
00080         { 
00081             typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::type type; 
00082             static const int  arity = boost::function_traits<R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::arity;
00083             static const bool is_const = false;
00084         };
00085         template<typename R, typename C BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00086         struct get_member_type<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const> 
00087         { 
00088             typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const>::type type; 
00089             static const int  arity = boost::function_traits<R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::arity;
00090             static const bool is_const = true;
00091         };
00092 
00093 
00094 #undef PARAM_ARGS
00095 #undef PARAM_NAMES
00096 #undef n
00097 
00098 #endif // BOOST_PP_IS_ITERATING
